text: Wilton is an unincorporated community in Boone County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. The lone business in Wilton is the Riverview Store, which serves the local community and users on the Katy trail. Wilton is on the Missouri River. ==History== A post office called Wilton was established in 1875, and remained in operation until 1925. The community was named after J. Wilton, a county official. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Boone County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Wilton, Missouri
